edu.arizona.biosemantics.semanticmarkup.markupelement.description.transform

Class MarkupDescriptionTreatmentTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.arizona.biosemantics.semanticmarkup.markupelement.description.transform.AbstractDescriptionTransformer
      • edu.arizona.biosemantics.semanticmarkup.markupelement.description.transform.MarkupDescriptionTreatmentTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDescriptionTransformer

    public class MarkupDescriptionTreatmentTransformer
extends AbstractDescriptionTransformer
    Transforms the treatments by semantically marking up the description treatment element of a treatment This can be used for the second and hence the 'markup' application for the iPlant integration
    Author:
    rodenhausen

      private int getTermCategoryRelationCount(edu.arizona.biosemantics.oto2.oto.shared.model.Collection collection) 
      protected void initGlossary(edu.arizona.biosemantics.oto.model.GlossaryDownload glossaryDownload, edu.arizona.biosemantics.oto2.oto.shared.model.Collection collection)
      Merge glossaryDownload and collection to one glossary which holds both terms and synonyms note: decisions from collection (results from term review by the user) takes priority over those from glossary note: synonyms and terms are disjoint -- add only term as entry to the glossary (addEntry), synonyms added as synonyms (addSynonym) For structure terms, both singular and plural forms are included in the synonyms
      protected void markupDescriptions(java.util.List<AbstractDescriptionsFile> descriptionsFiles, java.util.Map<Description,java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> sentencesForOrganStateMarker) 
      private java.util.HashSet<edu.arizona.biosemantics.common.ling.know.Term> mergeSynonyms(java.util.HashSet<edu.arizona.biosemantics.common.ling.know.Term> gsyns, java.util.HashSet<edu.arizona.biosemantics.common.ling.know.Term> dsyns)
      Term string takes the form of "syn:preferred"
      private void obtainSynonymsFromCollection(edu.arizona.biosemantics.oto2.oto.shared.model.Collection collection, java.util.HashSet<edu.arizona.biosemantics.common.ling.know.Term> dsyns)

      • initGlossary

        protected void initGlossary(edu.arizona.biosemantics.oto.model.GlossaryDownload glossaryDownload,
                            edu.arizona.biosemantics.oto2.oto.shared.model.Collection collection)
        Merge glossaryDownload and collection to one glossary which holds both terms and synonyms note: decisions from collection (results from term review by the user) takes priority over those from glossary note: synonyms and terms are disjoint -- add only term as entry to the glossary (addEntry), synonyms added as synonyms (addSynonym) For structure terms, both singular and plural forms are included in the synonyms
        Parameters:
        glossaryDownload -
        collection -

      • addSynonyms2Glossary

        Parameters:
        gsyns -
        Returns:
        set of synonyms added (minus the preferred terms)
